title: 谁能从Planet minecraft搬一个材质下来?
author: 鳄鱼软趴趴
txt_content:
本帖最后由 鳄鱼软趴趴 于 2011-11-30 16:16 编辑 

http://www.planetminecraft.com/texture_pack/my-unique-hd-texturepack-minecraft-19/
这个材质很喜欢.谁能拿过来吗?

这种怀旧的lomo照片风格一直很中意的.


(为什么这个帖子撤销不掉了)

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 well 于 2011-12-1 05:47 编辑 

查看了一下Google的頁面存檔... 
http://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:MjCVRwFO8jYJ:www.planetminecraft.com/texture_ ... p;ct=clnk&gl=tw

似乎有人反應那個是假的, 偽造的... ,所以被該網站撤銷了... 

如果看不到上頭的網頁, 底下把回覆貼上, 你看一下就知道大概情形了... 
有興趣的話, 自己找一下"Cinemacraft"視頻吧...

Level 12
Journeyman Architect
November 29, 2011, 3:53 am
This is probably fake, the pictures are from a youtube video, called Cinemacraft.
He's just after some free money..
